scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist && git rm -r --cache . && git reset && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:h: npm run build && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:prod
scripts.deploy:h:dev: npm run build:dev && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev
scripts.deploy:h:test: npm run build:test && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only hosting:test
scripts.deploy:f: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:dev: cd functions && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:test: cd functions && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:h && npm run deploy:f
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:h:dev && npm run deploy:f:dev
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:h:test && npm run deploy:f:test
